title: Meta Knowingly Exploits Kids for Profit
description:
In this video I discuss how Meta developed Instagram and Facebook to be more addictive to users under the age of 13, and how they've known since 2016 that 40% of people in that age demographic used Instagram on a daily basis despite being too young for the platform according to their own terms of service.
